column4: inedible large deep-dish pie was dropped at our table at 10:15pm
column5: over 2.5 hours after taking the order. Truly unbelievable
column6: even as I write this 24 hours later. The pizza-brained waitress couldn't even cut it because it was rock-hard
column7: and yet served it anyway. Of course we showed her that it was still frozen
column8: and she could only muster up a 'sorry' before running away to hide in the kitchen. My wife is pregnant
column9: and you served her a plate of still-frozen
